snippet: A father had worked for the U.S. government in Afghanistan, court documents show, and a restraining order was needed to keep his wife and children from a detention center....

headline.main: Harden's 33 Points Lead Rockets Over Grizzlies, 123-108
headline.print_headline: Harden's 33 Points Lead Rockets Over Grizzlies, 123-108

lead_paragraph: A father had worked for the U.S. government in Afghanistan, court documents show, and a restraining order was needed to keep his wife and children from a detention center.
